text: Frederick Kirby (born 1891) was an English amateur footballer who played as a forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1891 births Category:Sportspeople from Bishop Auckland Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Bishop Auckland F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Durham City A.F.C. players Category:Middlesbrough F.C. players Category:Halifax Town A.F.C. players Category:Bradford (Park Avenue) A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Year of death missing
title: Fred Kirby (footballer)
